# Pat Coy

 

[Mayor &amp; City Council](https://www.venetaoregon.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=10)  
Title: Councilor  
[Email Pat Coy](mailto:pcoy@venetaoregon.gov)

### Biography

Elected to a 4-year term in January 2024  
**Term Expiration**: December 31, 2028

- **Current Council Assignments**
  
  - Council President
  - Liaison to Mid Lane Cares
  - Liaison to Kiwanis
  - Secretary for FRAUG (Fern Ridge Area Unhoused Group)
- **Professional Background**
  
  - 30 years in the grocery business, 16 years as a store manager in CA &amp; OR
  - 19 years as an associate pastor
- **Educational Background**
  
  - BA from Washington State University in education
  - Ordained as a pastor in July 1979
- **Special Interest and Concerns**
  
  - I love to garden, play golf and spend time with my family. I swim in the summer and go to the gym all winter.
  - I'm very concerned about public safety, a healthy business climate and the appearance of our City.
  - Quality of life for our residents is very important
